sen.j: 宗像氏実（むなかた うじさね、生没年不詳）は、平安時代末期の宗像大社の第25代・第28代・第30代・第32代・第35代宮司である。
sen.e: Ujizane MUNAKATA (date of birth and death unknown) was the 25th, 28th, 30th, 32nd, and 35th chief of those who served shrine, controlled festivals and general affairs in Munakata Taisha Shrine at the end of Heian period.

Ujizane MUNAKATA (dates of birth and death unknown) was the 25th, 28th, 30th, 32nd, and 35th Guji (chief of those who served shrine, controlled festivals and general affairs) in Munakata Taisha Shrine at the end of Heian period.
sen.cmt: Gujiを挿入、複数化しました。
sen.e: Ujizane MUNAKATA (year of birth and death unknown) was the 25th, 28th, 30th, 32nd, and 35th Guji (chief of those who served shrine, controlled festivals and general affairs) in Munakata Taisha Shrine at the end of Heian period.
sen.cmt: year of birth and death unknownとしました。

sen.e: He was a child of Ujinobu MUNAKATA.
He was a child of Ujinobu MUNAKATA.
He was a child of Ujinobu MUNAKATA.
